channel.title: Im creating a timer
channel.description: Hi, Im making a timer for system update. BUT the server processes everything after 500 milliseconds(ms). 1000ms is 1 second. I need a timer that will update my server automatically after 5 minutes. Can anyone help me? Any help is appreciated. Thanks

item.title: Im creating a timer
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

mage_burst:

Hope This Helps.

Uhh no… All that is, is a quest interface… Nothing todo with time what so ever. This is no help Sorry[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 12:28:56 AM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 10:52:29 AM[/size][hr]Nobody knows how to make a timer the right way?

Read full topic

item.title: Im creating a timer
item.dc:creator: @mage_burst mage_burst
item.description:
@mage_burst wrote:

public String date = new SimpleDateFormat("MM/dd/yyyy").format(new Date()); //no need to be in process and cause extra lag public String time = "";

public void customInterface(){
//purp interface
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“Close Window”, 15949);//Close Text
sendQuest(" Welcome to “, 15950);//Title
sendQuest(”", 15960);//Under Title
sendQuest(" “, 15959);//Beside ^
sendQuest(”", 15961);//Beside ^
sendQuest("", 15951);//Bottom banner- top line
sendQuest(" Created by “, 15955);//top line
sendQuest(”", 15953);//top line
sendQuest("", 15958);//top line
sendQuest(" Special Attacks", 15952);//Bottom banner- bottom line
sendQuest("", 15956);//bottom line
sendQuest("", 15954);//bottom line
sendQuest("", 15957);//bottom line
showInterface(15944);
flushOutStream();
}

Hope This Helps.

Read full topic
